```{r}
library(knitr)
library(lubridate)
dataset<-read.table("clipboard",header=T,sep="\t",stringsAsFactor=F,na.strings=c("-","－"," ---- ","…"),check.names=F)
dataset[is.na(dataset)==T]<--9999
dataset<-data.frame(ID=seq(1,nrow(dataset),by=1),dataset,check.names=F)
tail(dataset)
```
